WorkItem.Description:

[Fri Apr 23 10:13:39 2010] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] PHP Fatal error:  Call to a member function getParent() on a non-object in C:\\...\\Classes\\PHPExcel\\Calculation.php on line 2874, referer: http://127.0.0.1/testExcel/

Myst
WorkItem.Summary: Call to a member function getParent() on a non-object in Classes\\PHPExcel\\Calculation.php

Comments.Message:
Additional trapping so that the calculation engine will raise an exception or throw an error if cell references exist in a formula that is being executed without reference to a cell, now added to SVN
Note that PHPExcel does not actively support Macro-enabled workbook (xlsm) files
